title: Animal Rights Advocates
description: We are an animal rights group that uses a number of ways to do vegan outreach online. If you're not a vegan you're invited to join and have a productive conversation regarding the topic!

title: Ask Yourself
description: Don't take my word for it, ask yourself.  (No New Members For Now)

title: Childfree Vegans
description: If you're a childfree vegan and/or curios about antinatalism, this is the place for you!

title: Futuro Vegano
description: Respeito Animal is a brazilian vegan server to vegans and non-vegans join discussions about animal rights in general.

title: HOL?House-Of-Logic
description:
Welcome to the House of Logic. A server dedicated to those who are interested in logic and philosophy.

Our server is based on discussions on philosophy focusing mainly on ethics. We discuss and debate on a lot of applied ethics such as veganism, anti-natalism, abortion, etc. We also follow strict anti-sophistry policy, so good faith interlocutors will not have to worry about dodging, misrepresenting, straw manning, etc.

title: Inebriated Vegans
description: Get drunk and talk Vegan.

description: Currently going through a Diana Rodgers debunk. The anti vegan producer of sacred cow propaganda and person who went on the JRE.

title: Level 5 Vegans
description: General Vegan server, I think this is a partner server of a teenager vegan server I wasn't able to join. Ageists...

title: Purring Base
description:
We are not as big as we want to be, but we scream our lunges out for the Voiceless!
We do Animal Activism - we are trying to connect Peoples Heart with Animals, so we inform and enlighten them.

There is no Platform we aren't on to give those a Voice, who got forgotten behind cold Walls.
We are a predominantly German Community. If you need information about gluten-free vegan life, you've come to the right place to get the support you need.

title: Reddit Manchester Vegans
description: This server is primarily based in Manchester and intends to be a relaxed social space to discuss and partake in vegan food and lifestyles within Manchester and the North of England, everyone is welcome, however. If you are just interested in veganism and need help, please come talk!

title: Solanaceae
description: Solenaceae is an adult only (no kids) Vegan server for hanging out and meeting up. Put your best foot forward and interact with like minded people here.

title: Study Archives
description: Server focused on compiling research mostly dedicated to veganism and vegan nutrition, along with some other topics.

title: TGD Vegan Hangout
description: Please Trans people only. This is a  safe space for vegans(who are also trans) to socialize. Thank you.

title: The Vegan Attic (Vegans Only)
description: chill vegan chatroom. small but consistent presence of people!

title: The Vegan Hive Mind
description: Join because your mind is merged with them. General Vegan server.

title: The Vegan Library
description: An archive server that includes helpful citations and papers across topics such as animal statistics, environment, and health intended to help vegans do activism. Note that there are no text channels with the ability to type - please join our parent server Vegan World.

title: Tofu Town
description: A space that aims to be as inclusive as possible, by not allowing any form of bigotry including (but not limited to): carnism, ableism, homophobia, racism, sexism, transphobia. It is a space where people can hang out casually, but also has dedicated spaces for vegan activism, carnie-spotting, etc.

title: Ultra Advocacy
description: Intense no joking around animal advocacy server. Vetting is pretty hard to get vegan role.

title: Untitled Vegan Server
description: Tight knit vegan server focused on giving vegans a social space. Video games, Book clubs, etc

title: upRootNutrition
description: An evidence-based community dedicated to debunking pseudoscience, especially in the fields of nutrition, health and fitness. Casual discourse is welcome, and includes topics such as cooking, gaming, technology, animals, and more! Current users span many disciplines and include both students and professionals in the fields of nutrition, statistics, medicine, and philosophy! All levels of interest and expertise are welcome!

title: Vegan Furries
description: A server for vegans that want to chill out! It's focused on the furry culture, but anyone is welcome if they are vegan or at least vegan curious. We also have a Minecraft server with vegan features ( no animal exploitation, and vegan foods ). And of course, we are pro disability rights, women's rights, queer rights, black rights, and beyond.

title: Vegan Gaming
description: A safe-space server for vegans who're looking for like-minded people to discuss and play video games with and the official companion server of the /r/vegangaming subreddit.

title: Vegan Homelab & Hackers
description:
A server for people who are interested in all things techie.
The server will be focused around Computers, Linux, Open-Source projects, Homelab/Self-Hosted, Hacking/Modding, etc.
Please join us if that sounds like something you like.

title: Indian Vegans ??
description:
?? Welcome to Indian Vegans ??

Are you passionate about veganism and looking for a supportive community? Look no further! Our server is dedicated to promoting the plant-based lifestyle with a focus on India. Whether you're a seasoned vegan or just curious about the lifestyle, everyone is welcome here. Share recipes, swap tips, and connect with other like-minded individuals. Let's work together to make a positive impact on our health, the environment, and the well-being of animals. Join us and be part of the Indian Vegans community! ??

title: Ottawa Veg Community
description:
VegOttawa is a member-based non-profit working to promote and support vegan lifestyle and business in Ottawa.
ï We partner with local veg-friendly businesses to provide discounts to our members.
ï We support and promote events involving vegan food, socializing, activities, and more.
ï We promote plant-based lifestyle for animals, health, and the environment.
ï We provide access to plant-based resources and community.

title: Trent Vegan Society
description: TVS encourages a vegan lifestyle in order to end the unnecessary suffering of animals, curb environmental degradation, and promote good health????

description:
vegan safe-space!

promote your recipes, learn about veganism, or make new friends like you! this is a safe community, you're free to express yourself here.

title: Earthly Delights
description: Tired of society and in need of friends? Do you want a hippie community, a place to talk, or feel at home? We might be able to help you! Join Eartly Delights and meet your new family. You rock! <3

title: Vegan

title: Vegans Against Trolls
description:
Vegans Against Trolls is a fast growing server to discuss and debate Veganism. The main goal of this server is to convert as many people to Veganism as possible. DO NOT JOIN TO TROLL, DO NOT JOIN IF YOU SUPPORT THE ARMY, DO NOT JOIN IF YOU ARE HOMOPHOBIC, RACIST, OR SEXIST.

There are many active spaces, VCs and Text Channels where you can discuss and debate Veganism. We respect all pronouns.

This server is a safe place for all identities such as LGBTQIA+, Vegans, and POC people. No discrimination is tolerated and follow Server Rules, Discord TOS and Discord Community Guidelines at all times.

title: Respect Animals
description:
Vegans and non-vegans alike are welcome to join in order to discuss all things vegan: food, lifestyle, commodities, activities, activism, and the animals who live with us.

We come from all walks of life and celebrate the demographic diversity of people who have come to respect animals as the sentient beings they are.
